event.description: Kyle Schwarber flies out to left fielder Matt Adams.
Kris Bryant called out on strikes.
Anthony Rizzo flies out to right fielder Randal Grichuk.
Ben Zobrist grounds out, second baseman Kolten Wong to first baseman Matt Carpenter.
Addison Russell flies out to right fielder Randal Grichuk.
Jason Heyward flies out to right fielder Randal Grichuk.
Miguel Montero grounds out to first baseman Matt Carpenter.
John Lackey singles on a sharp line drive to center fielder Dexter Fowler.
Jon Jay grounds into a force out, shortstop Aledmys Diaz to second baseman Kolten Wong. John Lackey out at 2nd. Jon Jay to 1st.
Kyle Schwarber strikes out swinging.
Kris Bryant strikes out on a foul tip.
Anthony Rizzo grounds out to first baseman Matt Carpenter.
Ben Zobrist grounds out, third baseman Jedd Gyorko to first baseman Matt Carpenter.
Addison Russell grounds out, shortstop Aledmys Diaz to first baseman Matt Carpenter.
Jason Heyward singles on a sharp line drive to right fielder Randal Grichuk.
Miguel Montero strikes out swinging.
John Lackey singles on a line drive to center fielder Dexter Fowler. Jason Heyward to 2nd.
Jon Jay singles on a ground ball to center fielder Dexter Fowler. Jason Heyward scores. John Lackey to 3rd. Jon Jay to 2nd on the throw.
Kyle Schwarber walks.
Kris Bryant lines out to center fielder Dexter Fowler.
Anthony Rizzo doubles (1) on a sharp line drive to left fielder Matt Adams.
Ben Zobrist grounds out, second baseman Kolten Wong to first baseman Matt Carpenter. Anthony Rizzo to 3rd.
Pitching Change: Matt Bowman replaces Lance Lynn, batting 5th.
Defensive switch from right field to left field for Randal Grichuk.
Defensive Substitution: Stephen Piscotty replaces pitcher Lance Lynn, batting 9th, playing right field.
Addison Russell grounds out, second baseman Kolten Wong to first baseman Matt Carpenter. Anthony Rizzo scores.
Jason Heyward singles on a soft ground ball to third baseman Jedd Gyorko.
Miguel Montero flies out to left fielder Randal Grichuk.
Pitching Change: Brett Cecil replaces Matt Bowman, batting 5th.
Offensive Substitution: Pinch-hitter Matt Szczur replaces John Lackey.
Matt Szczur strikes out swinging. Wild pitch by pitcher Brett Cecil. Matt Szczur to 1st.
Jon Jay walks. Matt Szczur to 2nd.
Kyle Schwarber homers (1) on a fly ball to right field. Matt Szczur scores. Jon Jay scores.
Kris Bryant walks.
Anthony Rizzo singles on a ground ball to center fielder Dexter Fowler. Kris Bryant to 3rd.
Pitching Change: Miguel Socolovich replaces Brett Cecil, batting 5th.
Ben Zobrist pops out to catcher Yadier Molina in foul territory.
Addison Russell grounds out softly, pitcher Miguel Socolovich to first baseman Matt Carpenter. Kris Bryant scores. Anthony Rizzo to 2nd.
Jason Heyward hit by pitch.
Miguel Montero flies out to center fielder Dexter Fowler.
Offensive Substitution: Pinch-hitter Javier Baez replaces Hector Rondon.
Javier Baez flies out to right fielder Stephen Piscotty.
Jon Jay singles on a fly ball to left fielder Randal Grichuk. Jon Jay advances to 2nd, on a fielding error by left fielder Randal Grichuk.
Kyle Schwarber called out on strikes.
Kris Bryant grounds out, third baseman Jedd Gyorko to first baseman Matt Carpenter.
Pitching Change: Sam Tuivailala replaces Miguel Socolovich, batting 5th, replacing Greg Garcia.
Anthony Rizzo strikes out on a foul tip.
Ben Zobrist singles on a ground ball to center fielder Dexter Fowler.
Addison Russell flies out to right fielder Stephen Piscotty.
Jason Heyward grounds out to first baseman Matt Carpenter.
Dexter Fowler grounds out, shortstop Addison Russell to first baseman Anthony Rizzo.
Aledmys Diaz singles on a ground ball to second baseman Ben Zobrist.
Matt Carpenter singles on a line drive to center fielder Jon Jay. Aledmys Diaz to 3rd.

Cardinals challenged (force play), call on the field was overturned: Yadier Molina reaches on a force attempt, missed catch error by second baseman Ben Zobrist, assist to shortstop Addison Russell. Aledmys Diaz scores. Matt Carpenter to 2nd.
Matt Adams singles on a ground ball to right fielder Jason Heyward. Matt Carpenter scores. Yadier Molina to 3rd.
Randal Grichuk singles on a line drive to left fielder Kyle Schwarber. Yadier Molina scores. Matt Adams to 2nd.
Jedd Gyorko called out on strikes.
Kolten Wong walks. Matt Adams to 3rd. Randal Grichuk to 2nd.
Lance Lynn flies out to center fielder Jon Jay.
Dexter Fowler singles on a line drive to left fielder Kyle Schwarber.
Aledmys Diaz grounds into a double play, third baseman Kris Bryant to second baseman Ben Zobrist to first baseman Anthony Rizzo. Dexter Fowler out at 2nd.
Matt Carpenter flies out to center fielder Jon Jay.
Yadier Molina strikes out swinging.
Matt Adams strikes out swinging.
Randal Grichuk strikes out swinging.
Jedd Gyorko flies out sharply to left fielder Kyle Schwarber.
Kolten Wong grounds out, second baseman Ben Zobrist to first baseman Anthony Rizzo.
Lance Lynn strikes out swinging.
Dexter Fowler strikes out swinging, catcher Miguel Montero to first baseman Anthony Rizzo.
Aledmys Diaz doubles (2) on a line drive to left fielder Kyle Schwarber.
With Matt Carpenter batting, wild pitch by John Lackey, Aledmys Diaz to 3rd.
Matt Carpenter walks.
Yadier Molina out on a sacrifice fly to left fielder Kyle Schwarber. Aledmys Diaz scores.
Matt Adams strikes out swinging.
Randal Grichuk grounds out, third baseman Kris Bryant to first baseman Anthony Rizzo.
Jedd Gyorko grounds out, second baseman Ben Zobrist to first baseman Anthony Rizzo.
Kolten Wong grounds out sharply, second baseman Ben Zobrist to first baseman Anthony Rizzo.
Pitching Change: Hector Rondon replaces John Lackey, batting 8th, replacing Matt Szczur.
Stephen Piscotty called out on strikes.
Dexter Fowler flies out to center fielder Jon Jay.
Aledmys Diaz lines out to left fielder Kyle Schwarber.
Pitching Change: Pedro Strop replaces Hector Rondon, batting 1st, replacing left fielder Kyle Schwarber.
Defensive switch from second base to left field for Ben Zobrist.
Javier Baez remains in the game as the second baseman.
Matt Carpenter grounds out, third baseman Kris Bryant to first baseman Anthony Rizzo.
Yadier Molina walks.
Offensive Substitution: Pinch-hitter Greg Garcia replaces Miguel Socolovich.
Greg Garcia reaches on a missed catch error by pitcher Pedro Strop, assist to second baseman Javier Baez. Yadier Molina to 2nd.
Pitching Change: Carl Edwards replaces Pedro Strop, batting 1st.
Randal Grichuk strikes out swinging.
Jedd Gyorko called out on strikes.
Pitching Change: Wade Davis replaces Carl Edwards, batting 1st.
Kolten Wong doubles (1) on a sharp line drive to center fielder Jon Jay.
Stephen Piscotty grounds out, second baseman Javier Baez to first baseman Anthony Rizzo. Kolten Wong to 3rd.
Dexter Fowler strikes out swinging.
Aledmys Diaz lines out to right fielder Jason Heyward.
